title: IT company Hexaware Tech to add 10,000 more to headcount in 2022 - Business Standard
content: IT company Hexaware Tech to add 10,000 more to headcount in 2022  Business Standard
description: Hexaware had hired 10,000 people both from campuses and laterals in 2021 -- taking its headcount to 25,000 from 15,000 in 2020
